DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate potential beneficial cardiometabolic effect moderate ( 5 % ) weight loss progressive ( 5 % , 10 % , 15 % ) weight loss obese adult without diabetes . Participants randomly assign one 2 group . Group 1 : supervise weight loss group ( low-calorie diet ) . Group 2 : supervise weight maintenance group ( normal diet ) . Of assigned group 1 , half participant lose 5 % body weight half lose 5 % , 10 % , 15 % weight time guidance dietitian . Research test repeat time point ( 5 % , 10 % , 15 % weight loss ) . In group 2 , research test repeat six month .
DOC.criteria: Obese : Body Mass Index 30 45 Insulin Resistant : HOMAIR score great equal 2 diabetes smoke pregnancy breastfeed heart failure history liver disease include hepatitis alcoholism exercise 2 hour per week
